item.title: Quotes
item.description: A growing list of quotes as I encounter them.

item.title: About
item.description: I was born in the 80’s in a mid-size town in Wisconsin. I feel like my start was quite unassuming. My family had a heavy work ethic and would unwind in true Wisconsin fashion at the end of each week. I spent many of my earlier days playing on or around the Chippewa river. This is where I learned to waterski and enjoy the outdoors. I worked hard through my high school years to the point where I dropped some of my extra curricular activities.

item.title: Publications

Journal Cell Biology 2020 Wait, E, Winter, M, & Cohen, A R: Hydra Image Processor: 5-D GPU image analysis library with MATLAB and python wrappers. Bioinformatics 2019 Aaron J, Wait E, DeSantis M, Chew TL: Practical Considerations in Particle and Object Tracking and Analysis.
